top.title: Thailand and Cambodia agree ceasefire after weeks of deadly clashes
top.summary: Almost one million people have been displaced since hostilities resumed earlier this month.

top.title: Zelensky plans to meet Trump on Sunday for talks on ending Russian war
top.summary: The Ukrainian president says he will see his US counterpart in Florida, as Kyiv's mayor says Russia launched new air strikes on the capital.

top.title: 'We will vote but not with our hearts': Inside the election staged by Myanmar's military rulers
top.summary: This is the first election since the army's coup in early 2021 - and it is being widely condemned as a sham.

top.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
top.summary: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.

top.title: TikTok removes AI weight loss ads from fake Boots account
top.summary: The adverts for prescription-only drugs showed healthcare professionals impersonating the British retailer.

top.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
top.summary: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.
